DOC.brief_summary: This purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy and tolerability of pregabalin in treating idiopathic RLS patients for up to 12 months.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Study Of Pregabalin In Idiopathic Restless Legs Syndrome Patients
DOC.criteria: idiopathic RLS with the presence of all four clinical manifestations of RLS RLS symptoms occur predominantly in the evening RLS history at least 6 months IRLS => 15 at the beginning and the end of placebo runin Have =>15 nights with RLS symptoms in the month prior to screening Any secondary RLS Current augmentation due to RLS treatment Placebo responders identified during the placebo runin
